CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper December 1, 1945, pg. 27, reads: "Prominent Hostesses - The Southern Belles, popular group of maids and matrons, are planning some swanky affairs for the coming holiday season.  Left to right: Lena Williams, club reporter; Irma Robertson, treasurer; Lulu Sumpton, also a reporter; Inez Jackson, president; Irene Smith, social chairman; Viola Williams, secretary. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Members of the Southern Belles, from left: Lena Williams, Irma Robertson, Lulu Sumpton, Inez Jackson, Irene Smith, and Viola Williams posed at bar with photographs of dancers and club scenes on wall
